name: knex-migrator

scripts.ship: STATUS=$(git status --porcelain); echo $STATUS; if [ -z "$STATUS" ]; then yarn publish && git push --follow-tags; fi
scripts.test: yarn lint && LEVEL=fatal _mocha --require test/utils.js --report lcovonly -- test/**/*_spec.js
scripts.test:unit: yarn lint && LEVEL=fatal _mocha --require test/utils.js --report lcovonly -- test/unit/*_spec.js
